info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 16 at 4:23PM EDT until June 16 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM EDT FOR WEST CENTRAL PRINCE GEORGE AND NORTHEASTERN DINWIDDIE COUNTIES AND THE CITY OF PETERSBURG... At 423 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Petersburg, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Prince George around 440 PM EDT. Disputanta around 450 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include New Bohemia, Petersburg Airport, Richard Bland College, Petersburg National Battlefield, Addison and Prince George Golf. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
